description: Magic Line starts and finishes at the Kimberley Nordic Centre.  Mainly a single track trail it has three hilltops to climb and descend over its 7 km route.  Originally designed as a mountain bike trail it has become popular with hikers and snowshoers.  Each hilltop offers excellent views of the Rockies and the Kimberley area.
directions: Start at the Kimberley Nordic Centre at the end of Northstar Drive.
title: Magic Line
